original_text: You were watching me to see if I did wrong things. Then you would refuse to forgive me. You were watching me to see if I did wrong things. Then you would refuse to forgive me. You were watching me to see if I did wrong things.
korean_text: 내가 범죄하면 주께서 나를 죄인으로 인정하시고 내 죄악을 사하지 아니하시나이다

sentences.original_text: to see if I did wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 잘못된 일을 하는지 보기 위해

sentences.original_text: Then you would refuse to forgive me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신은 나를 용서하기를 거부할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to see if I did wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 잘못된 일을 하는지 보기 위해
